item.title: Sylvania GNET13001
item.description: The Sylvania GNET13001 is a small and lightweight netbook with a 7-inch WVGA TFT active matrix display, measuring 9.1 x 6.7 x 1.2 inches and weighing only 1.87 lbs.

item.title: Sylvania G Netbook Meso
item.description: Weighing only about 2.2 Pounds with approximate unit dimensions of 9 x 7 x 1.25 inches the g Netbook Meso by Sylvania offers uncompromising mobility.
